Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player

Class PlayerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player.PlayerState
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateBuyCard, StateBuyResource, StateGameEnded, StateNewTurn, StateProduction, StateSetupCard, StateSetupResources, StateStoreResource, StateWait
public abstract class PlayerState extends Object
Abstract class which represent a player state. Every phase of the game/turn has been implemented with a state pattern. All the methods of the class call athe invalidAction methods which notify the player that the move done is illegal. Each of the state which extends this class will override the methods allowed in that state.
